from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, when, coalesce, lit, current_timestamp
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

# Define paths
storage_account_name = "synapsestr"
delta_container_name = "nervecentre-delta"
target_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_Procedure'
source_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_Procedures_vw'

# Create SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.appName("ECDS_Procedure_Update_Part1").getOrCreate()

# Read target table and source view
target_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, target_path)
source_df = spark.read.format("delta").load(source_path)

# Perform the MERGE operation
(target_table.alias("TGT")
 .merge(
    source_df.alias("SRC"),
    "TGT.visitarchiveid = SRC.visitarchiveid AND TGT.ProcedureOrder = SRC.ProcedureOrder"
 )
 .whenMatchedUpdate(
    condition = """
        (COALESCE(TGT.ProcedureDesc, 'X') != COALESCE(SRC.ProcedureDesc, 'X')) OR
        (COALESCE(TGT.EC_Procedure_Date_Time, to_timestamp('1900-01-01')) != COALESCE(SRC.EC_Procedure_Date_Time, to_timestamp('1900-01-01'))) OR
        (COALESCE(TGT.EC_ProcedureCodeSNOMED, 'X') != COALESCE(SRC.EC_ProcedureCodeSNOMED, 'X')) OR
        (COALESCE(TGT.EC_ProcedureCodeCDS, 'X') != COALESCE(SRC.EC_ProcedureCodeCDS, 'X'))
    """,
    set = {
        "ProcedureDesc": "SRC.ProcedureDesc",
        "EC_Procedure_Date_Time": "SRC.EC_Procedure_Date_Time",
        "EC_ProcedureCodeSNOMED": "SRC.EC_ProcedureCodeSNOMED",
        "EC_ProcedureCodeCDS": "SRC.EC_ProcedureCodeCDS",
        "AmendOn": "current_timestamp()"
    }
 )
 .whenNotMatchedInsert(
    values = {
        "visitarchiveid": "SRC.visitarchiveid",
        "ProcedureOrder": "SRC.ProcedureOrder",
        "ProcedureDesc": "SRC.ProcedureDesc",
        "EC_Procedure_Date_Time": "SRC.EC_Procedure_Date_Time",
        "EC_ProcedureCodeSNOMED": "SRC.EC_ProcedureCodeSNOMED",
        "EC_ProcedureCodeCDS": "SRC.EC_ProcedureCodeCDS"
    }
 )
 .whenNotMatchedBySource()
 .delete()
 .execute())

# Log the number of affected rows (optional)
affected_rows = target_table.toDF().count()
print(f"Number of rows in the target table after merge: {affected_rows}")

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, when, coalesce, lit, current_timestamp
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

# Define paths
storage_account_name = "synapsestr"
delta_container_name = "nervecentre-delta"
target_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_Procedure'
source_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_Procedures_vw'

# Create SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.appName("ECDS_Procedure_Update_Part1").getOrCreate()

# Read target table and source view
target_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, target_path)
source_df = spark.read.format("delta").load(source_path)

# Perform the MERGE operation
(target_table.alias("TGT")
 .merge(
    source_df.alias("SRC"),
    "TGT.visitarchiveid = SRC.visitarchiveid AND TGT.ProcedureOrder = SRC.ProcedureOrder"
 )
 .whenMatchedUpdate(
    condition = """
        (COALESCE(TGT.ProcedureDesc, 'X') != COALESCE(SRC.ProcedureDesc, 'X')) OR
        (COALESCE(TGT.EC_Procedure_Date_Time, to_timestamp('1900-01-01')) != COALESCE(SRC.EC_Procedure_Date_Time, to_timestamp('1900-01-01'))) OR
        (COALESCE(TGT.EC_ProcedureCodeSNOMED, 'X') != COALESCE(SRC.EC_ProcedureCodeSNOMED, 'X')) OR
        (COALESCE(TGT.EC_ProcedureCodeCDS, 'X') != COALESCE(SRC.EC_ProcedureCodeCDS, 'X'))
    """,
    set = {
        "ProcedureDesc": "SRC.ProcedureDesc",
        "EC_Procedure_Date_Time": "SRC.EC_Procedure_Date_Time",
        "EC_ProcedureCodeSNOMED": "SRC.EC_ProcedureCodeSNOMED",
        "EC_ProcedureCodeCDS": "SRC.EC_ProcedureCodeCDS",
        "AmendOn": "current_timestamp()"
    }
 )
 .whenNotMatchedInsert(
    values = {
        "visitarchiveid": "SRC.visitarchiveid",
        "ProcedureOrder": "SRC.ProcedureOrder",
        "ProcedureDesc": "SRC.ProcedureDesc",
        "EC_Procedure_Date_Time": "SRC.EC_Procedure_Date_Time",
        "EC_ProcedureCodeSNOMED": "SRC.EC_ProcedureCodeSNOMED",
        "EC_ProcedureCodeCDS": "SRC.EC_ProcedureCodeCDS"
    }
 )
 .execute())

# Handle deletions separately
target_df = target_table.toDF()
rows_to_keep = target_df.join(source_df, ["visitarchiveid", "ProcedureOrder"], "leftsemi")
rows_to_keep.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(target_path)

# Log the number of affected rows (optional)
affected_rows = rows_to_keep.count()
print(f"Number of rows in the target table after merge and delete: {affected_rows}")
